com.glkwhr.snakegame

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glkwhr.snakegame.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    GameController class receives user input and controls the game.
    Since:
    Aug 29, 2017
    Author:
    H.W.
